body_html:
OK, this workaround gets it to compile:

cd third_party
ln -s /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include/numpy .

Then add -Ithird_party to the includes in tensorflow/python/BUILD and tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
body_text:
OK, this workaround gets it to compile:
cd third_party

Then add -Ithird_party to the includes in tensorflow/python/BUILD and tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
body:
OK, this workaround gets it to compile:

```
cd third_party
ln -s /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include/numpy .
```

Then add `-Ithird_party` to the includes in `tensorflow/python/BUILD` and `tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl`
